ptserver.data.handler

Class PingPongTokenHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptserver.data.handler.PingPongTokenHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenHandler<Token>

    public class PingPongTokenHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenHandler<Token>
    PingPongTokenHandler converts tokens from bytestream and back.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov

    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:

        Return a Ping or Pong token depending on the tokenType by deserializing the inputStream.
        Specified by:
        convertToToken in interface TokenHandler<Token>
